summary: Goku and his family and friends encounter Vegeta's brother, and a threat from Vegeta's past shows up and causes trouble.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Ryô Horikawa|Tôru Furuya|Mayumi Tanaka|Toshio Furukawa|Hiromi Tsuru|Naoko Watanabe|Naoki Tatsuta|Takeshi Kusao|Hiroshi Masuoka|Miki Itô|Yûko Minaguchi|Daisuke Gôri|Masakazu Morita|Kumiko Nishihara|Yûsuke Numata|Kazunari Tanaka|Yasunori Masutani|Eiji Takemoto|Yuka Saitô|Kanae Itô|Takahiro Fujimoto|Hiroshi Okamoto|Umeka Shôji|Aiko Hibi|Jôji Yanami
title: Dragon Ball: ¡Hey! ¡Vuelven Son Goku y sus amigos!
